name: Super Duper Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff
author: cwmom98
summary: A super-easy stroganoff with little-to-no fuss. It smells wonderful and is tasty like no other stroganoff you've had before thanks to the addition of cream cheese along with the sour cream. Of course, serve over hot, buttered flat noodles. Try it, and your taste buds will thank you!
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds cubed beef stew meat
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Spread beef stew meat into bottom of slow cooker crock; season with salt and pepper
Pour mushroom soup and water over the beef; add chives, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, and beef bouillon
Whisk red wine, cornstarch, and flour together in a small bowl; pour over the mixture in the slow cooker
Cook on Low for 6 to 7 hours
Stir sour cream, mushrooms, cream cheese, and parsley into the beef mixture; continue cooking for 1 hour more
